Item.message: Ok Robot! What do we destroy today?
The motherboard has been overtaken by agressive malignant programs. Unfortunalely, they threaten both the system's data and our corporeal integrity.
I recommand a cautious approach so we can keep the ship's repairs to a minimum.
What are you useful for if not repairing the ship?
My language subsystems also fit for philosophical dissertation and metaphysical inquiries.
